Normally I don't write negative comments, but these are too much.  How do I fit 32gig on a disk,  Zipped files, 80gigs.  LOL!  
A 320gig HD is $50.

It appears that all the prior commenters did not look at the torrent - it is FIVE DVD9s, not a single one.  The files in this torrent are in DVD format (VOB) and ready to burn.  By the way, you can use freeware like DVDShrink to take these VOB files and compress to 5 single layer DVDs.

Although it will probably take me awhile to download this, I appreciate very much what you have done.  Most uploaders upload compressed .avi versions or other formats of DVD's and not the whole thing.  There are 27 episodes, on 5 DVD's and since they are probably VOB/BUP/IFO files, it's very easy to do either a 1 to 1 copy or whatever you want to do.  Much less work on the downloaders end.  If no one else has done it, I may upload this in a compressed format once I have it.  I have a 20 megabit d/l connection, but that doesn't mean much with torrents. :)  Hopefully I don't get throttled again by my ISP. Thanks again mike18xx.
